Chatbot: Good morning! How's your glucose level today?

You: Oh, good morning! Well, I had a bit of a rough night, so my pre-meal glucose was a bit higher than usual. It was 145 mg/dL, but I've been trying to keep up with my insulin doses. I've had a few stressors at work lately, which I know can impact my numbers

Chatbot: Hi there! How's your weight looking today? Remember, it's important to keep us updated with any changes.

You: Oh, hi there! Well, I've managed to keep things more or less the same, I think. My scale showed 73kg this morning, which is just a tad lighter than last week. I've been trying to stick to my meal plan, but you know how it goes - life gets in

"Hey doc, just wanted to let you know I took 7 units of my trusty insulin friend, Novolog, around 18:30 this evening. I'm not quite sure if it was before or after dinner, but I'll try to remember to check the label next time. I injected it in my thigh, as usual. Hopefully, this dose will help me avoid another late-night low. Fingers crossed!"
